backend/main.mo: Defines watermark config types, stores them in a map keyed by user ID, and exposes functions to set and retrieve a user's watermark configuration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing multiple frontend file targets, feature descriptions, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping many frontend file paths to short descriptions for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base variables, dark mode overrides, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and initializes pdfMake on startup via useEffect.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Renders placeholder ad slots with size variants and simple styling.
frontend/src/components/blog/blogPosts.t: Exports metadata for available blog posts including slug, title, excerpt, route, and date.
frontend/src/components/faq/ToolFaq.tsx: Reusable accordion-based FAQ component for tool pages.
frontend/src/components/home/BlogPreview: Displays the two latest blog posts with preview cards and a link to the blog index.
frontend/src/components/home/Hero.tsx: Hero section with headline, description, and CTA button navigating to merge-pdf tool.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeFaq.tsx: Homepage FAQ section using accordion items with predefined common questions.
frontend/src/components/home/toolsCatalo: Defines the Tool interface and exports a catalog of PDF, image, and conversion tools with metadata.
frontend/src/components/home/ToolsGrid.t: Renders a grid of tool cards from toolsCatalog and navigates users to each tool’s route.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with tool links, resources, trust notes, and URL copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Provides a responsive navigation bar with links, logo, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with navbar, footer, and ad slots, including a sidebar for large screens.
frontend/src/components/seo/RelatedTools: Shows related tool links based on provided tool IDs using the tools catalog.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Applies SEO metadata using a custom hook and renders nothing visually.
frontend/src/components/tools/image/Imag: Displays UI controls for resizing images by pixels, percentage, or target size and passes parsed options to a processor.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/ImageT: Offers controls for configuring image‑to‑PDF settings including page size, fit mode, and margins.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Remove: UI for entering page numbers or ranges to remove from a PDF, with guidance and validation hints.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Resize: Allows selecting a target page size for resizing PDF pages.
frontend/src/components/tools/pdf/Waterm: Provides controls to configure text watermark settings such as text, opacity, font, rotation, and position.
Renders a canvas preview of the configured watermark based on text, font, opacity, rotation, and placement.
frontend/src/components/tools/processors: Exports conversion processors and related initialization utilities for Word‑PDF conversions.
Converts a PDF to a basic text-only DOCX by loading pdf-lib and docx libraries, creating placeholder text per page, and generating a Word document with progress updates and file-size validation.
Loads and initializes pdfMake and its VFS fonts from CDN, validating proper setup and exposing initialized instances for Word-to-PDF conversion.
Extracts text from a DOCX using JSZip and generates a simple text-only PDF with pdfMake, including progress reporting and library initialization checks.
Resizes images by pixels, percentage, or target file size using canvas operations, with validation, progressive updates, and optional quality tuning.
Adds a text watermark to each PDF page using pdf-lib with configurable placement, font, opacity, rotation, and progress tracking.
Loads and resaves a PDF with basic compression settings using pdf-lib, reporting progress and returning a potentially smaller PDF blob.
Converts image files (JPG/PNG) into a PDF, scaling and positioning each image based on fit mode, page size, and margins while tracking progress.
Re-exports all PDF processor modules and related option types for unified access.
Merges multiple PDF files into a single document by copying pages sequentially with progress reporting.
Defines standard PDF page sizes and a helper to retrieve dimensions by name.
Deprecated backend PDF client with stubbed methods that always throw errors, kept only for compatibility.
Provides shared utilities for loading pdf-lib, reading files, validating size, updating progress, and basic PDF operations.
Removes selected pages from a PDF, validating ranges and reconstructing a new document with progress tracking.
Resizes each page of a PDF to a target page size by scaling and centering original content into a new document.
Splits a PDF into individual pages and packages them into a ZIP file, loading JSZip dynamically and updating progress.
frontend/src/components/tools/SelectedFi: Lists selected files with type and size info and optional remove buttons.
Defines a ToolError type, normalizes errors, and maps them to user‑friendly messages based on content and tool ID.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolExperi: Manages the full tool workflow including file upload, options, processing state, errors, and results.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolNextSt: Displays a visual callout prompting the user to proceed to the next step.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPageSh: Provides a page wrapper with a title, description, and content area for a tool page.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolPrimar: A styled primary action button supporting loading state and optional icons.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolResult: Shows a success message and provides a button to download the processed file.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolSecond: A generic secondary action button supporting variants and optional icons.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolStepIn: Renders a 3‑step progress indicator that highlights completed and current steps with dynamic styling.
frontend/src/components/tools/UploadDrop: Provides a drag‑and‑drop file upload area with type and size validation, error handling, and optional file list display.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustNotes: Renders a three‑item trust section highlighting security, no login, and fast processing.
frontend/src/config/toolLimits.ts: Defines file size limits and provides helper functions for generating error messages about limits and file types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for managing authentication via Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoMeta.ts: Updates document title and description meta tag when called.
frontend/src/hooks/useToolJob.ts: Manages job state for tool processing, handling progress, results, and error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, a green color theme, dark mode styles, prose formatting, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Implements a mobile‑friendly blob download helper using a temporary link element.
frontend/src/lib/fileFormat.ts: Formats file sizes and provides user‑friendly labels for common file types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/blog/BlogIndexPage.ts: Renders the blog index with SEO metadata and a list of blog post cards linking to articles.
frontend/src/pages/blog/HowToCompressPdf: A blog article component explaining how to compress PDFs online, including steps, benefits, tips, and related tool links.
frontend/src/pages/blog/ResizeImageUnder: A blog page guiding users on resizing images under 50KB with instructions, tips, use cases, and a call-to-action link to the resize tool.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Assembles the homepage with SEO metadata, hero section, tools grid, FAQ, and blog preview.
frontend/src/pages/tools/AddWatermarkPag: A tool page for adding text watermarks to PDFs, handling file selection, validation, processing, previews, and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/CompressPdfPage: A PDF compression tool page that processes a single PDF using the compress processor, displays progress, and shows FAQs and related tools.
A tool page that converts one or more images into a PDF with customizable layout options, processing logic, and FAQs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/MergePdfPage.ts: A tool page for merging multiple PDFs in-browser, managing processing via useToolJob and providing FAQs and related tool links.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfToWordPage.t: Renders the PDF-to-Word conversion page, handling file selection, validation, processing, and user feedback.
frontend/src/pages/tools/RemovePagesPage: Provides UI and logic for removing specific pages from a PDF, including page range parsing and PDF processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizeImagePage: Implements an image resizing tool with file validation, preview handling, and in-browser resize processing.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ResizePdfPage.t: Allows users to resize PDF pages to standard dimensions and processes the PDF in-browser.
frontend/src/pages/tools/SplitPdfPage.ts: Handles splitting a PDF into individual pages and packaging them into a ZIP file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WordToPdfPage.t: Implements Word-to-PDF conversion with file selection, validation, and job-based progress handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current issues with pdfMake VFS loading and listing required fixes and existing feature requirements.
